changelogs.description: Joomla system plugin. Register and override JHtml helpers. And much more.
changelogs.maintainer: G@HService Berlin NeukÃ¶lln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer

addition.item: Contact form XML. Allow hidden phone field.

fix.item: J!4.3 ArrayHelper::getColumn() fixes. Use array_column instead.

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Recommended: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Recommended: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Recommended: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Recommended: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

addition.item:
Web Asset Manager (WAM), J!4: Load/Use the plugin's own media\joomla.asset.json.
WAM: Add asset plg_system_bs3ghsvs.templatejs and use in JHtml.
WAM: html/bootstrapghsvs::framework().
WAM: html\bs3ghsvs.php addsprungmarke.
Provide *.gz files in /media/.

remove.item:
Remove fontawesome-free. No replacement.
Remove JLayout scroll-to-article-modal. bs3ghsvs.smoothscroll.
Remove bloglisttoggle. PHP, JS, JHtml.

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Recommended: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

fix.item: J!4 bug. parent category JLayout. Use parent_id, not parent_slug. Doesn't exist in Joomla 4.

remove.item:
media/. Removed several assets in favor of pkg_file_assetghsvs.
- '/media/plg_system_bs3ghsvs/scss/bootstrap',
- '/media/plg_system_bs3ghsvs/js/bootstrap',
- '/media/plg_system_bs3ghsvs/css/bootstrap',
- '/media/plg_system_bs3ghsvs/js/jquery',
- '/media/plg_system_bs3ghsvs/js/jquery-migrate'

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs
Optional: For assets (e.g. Bootstrap) pkg_file_assetghsvs. Lots of assets have been removed from this plugin (Bootstrap CSS, JS, SCSS. JQuery JS. JQuery-slim. JQuery-migrate.).

Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

addition.item: Additional param for Structured Data BreadCrumbList. BreadCrumbList can be used now independent of other settings.

change.item: Many code changes because of php codstyle fixer.

fix.item: Structured Data. Use WAM for SCRIPT ld+json if is Joomla 4 because addcustomtag doesn't work under some circumstances.

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

addition.item: New feature: modulePosition.xml. Change module position on selected menu items.

fix.item: template.js. Bug fix. Sometimes JCH removes STYLE for stickyCompensation.

language.item: Strings for new feature "Change module position on selected menu items.".

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

fix.item: html\iconghsvs.php. printButton. Remove inline JS (nonces conflict)

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

fix.item: bs3ghsvs.php. getDescription() PHP8 bug fix htmlspecialchars(): Passing null to parameter # 1

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

fix.item: Bug fix for Joomla 4. Leave $article->images untouched.

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

change.item: template.js Replace jQuery remove/add class from <html> with vanilla.

remove.item: Remove buggy and never used feature "vorschaltseite".
Remove "frontendEditing" for modules. Nice but seldomly used.
Remove SVG icons from /media/ in favor of pkg_file_iconsghsvs.

requirement.entry:
Requires: Optional: For feature "Structured Data" pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs
Optional: For feature "Image Resize" pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs
Optional: For feature "Embed SVG" pkg_file_iconsghsvs

change.item:
Backend configuration cleaned up. Nothing new.
- Reorder imageresize fields.
- - Add colored headlines. Spacers to notes.
- - Add showon parameters.
- - Correct descriptions.
- - Remove some empty descriptions.

addition.item: Moved Termin putput from articlesubtitle to this plugin.

language.item: New lang strings concerning articleTermin.xml features.

addition.item: Mainly: New feature for sites with strange image filenames: New setting "imgSrcDetection": html4|html5.

fix.item: Mainly: New feature for sites with strange image filenames: New setting "imgSrcDetection": html4|html5.

note.item: This version doesn't provide an update server entry because of changed Bootstrap version.

addition.item: PagebreakHelper. Merge provided params/options and plugin parameters.

fix.item: PagebreakHelper. New regex. At least minimize conflicts with plg_content_prismhighlighterghsvs.
Warning: Undefined array key "title" in PagebreakHelper.php

addition.item:
Build procedure: New build/replaceXml.js.
dist/update.xml
dist/changelog.xml

remove.item: Footable JHtml helper in favour of plg_system_footable. CSS not ported yet!

change.item: Remove [intervention/image] library from this plugin. Install https://github.com/GHSVS-de/pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs/releases if you want to use the "Structured Data" feature of this plugin!

remove.item: Joomla 4: Remove "PLG_SYSTEM_BS3GHSV_EMPTY_DESC". I presume: Joomla 4 is stupid enough to display the language placeholder below the field even if language string exists but is translated to an empty string.

addition.item: Jommla 4: New function extractImagePath() because image_intro and _fulltext have B\C breaking new format now.
Form field to inform user that lib_imgresizeghsvs not found.

requirement.entry: maximumJoomla: 3.10.x But removed J4 blockage for testing purposes.

fix.item: Several bug fixes when feature "Image Resize" disabled and/or pkg_lib_imgresizeghsvs not installed.

change.item: Remove [spatie/schema-org] library from this plugin. Install https://github.com/GHSVS-de/pkg_lib_structuredataghsvs/releases if you want to use the "Structured Data" feature of this plugin!
Minimized fontawesome-free to only CSS needs.

note.item: Be aware! If you use older versions with Bootstrap 4 you may get problems if you use the BS SCSS from the media folder of this plugin for compilation.

requirement.entry: maximumJoomla: 3.10.x But removed J4 blockage for testing purposes.
